function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased hunting pressure and shifts in trading patterns leading to enhanced trading of endangered species","Impact":"Potential increase in endangered species degradation and extinction","Mitigation":"Strengthening of wildlife trade regulations and enforcement of anti-poaching laws","Technologies":"Surveillance technology for monitoring and enforcement","People":"Endangered species, wildlife conservation organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, law enforcement, wildlife conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Disease transmission between wildlife and domestic animals impacting local incomes and livelihoods","Impact":"Negative economic impact on local communities and businesses","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce disease transmission and providing support to affected businesses and individuals","Technologies":"Animal health monitoring technology, public health intervention measures","People":"Local communities, businesses, individuals","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, local community leaders"},{"Description":"Sudden and sustained decline in tourist numbers impacting local revenue and livelihoods","Impact":"Decrease in local revenue and economic hardship for local communities","Mitigation":"Diversification of economic activities, promotion of alternative tourism strategies, and financial support for affected communities","Technologies":"Economic diversification planning tools, tourism development technology","People":"Local communities, tourism businesses","Owner":"Local government, tourism organizations, economic development agencies"}]}
